title: Immune Aid Essential Oil Blend
description: Our immune systems are beaten upon daily from the wear and tear of everyday life. Whether it stems from nutrient-poor diets, long days spent at work, or the tension and worry from our roles in family and life, our immune systems are constantly in need of a little pick me up.
cleaned_text: Lab Tested Ingredients Each batch of essential oil is carefully evaluated through independent third-party GC/MS (gas chromatography/mass spectrometry) testing to verify botanical species and ensure purity. Because we value transparency and honesty, these reports are published so you know exactly what is in your bottle. Additionally, we perform ongoing internal GC/MS analysis, test for refractive index and specific gravity, and conduct organoleptic testing on every oil we sell. Learn more at [What is GC/MS Testing and
